Daniel you are correct about the neo-cons....but they and those influenced (to put it very mildly) by AIPAC are very often the same people. But yes my default setting for why America is so disliked by so many and why American lives are endangered are the influences of 1 AIPAC and Israel and idiot evangelicals (Cruz&Rubio voters etc),2 Neo Cons as you say and 3 politicians financed by the U.S. arms industry. These three overlap each other greatly to the extent of almost being indistinguishable from each other. And before you sound like the idiots on FOX and crazily equate anti-zionism with anti-semitism, Bernie Sanders is the only candidate that does not fall into 1 or more of these groups and his human decency and intelligence are why almost all non african american muslims in your country support him

Carter, you earned those beautiful battle scars. Be proud of every one of them. You fought the fierce battle and came out a winner! Our seven year old great granddaughter went through open heart surgery and shows off her scar. God is watching over you, Carter, and even though those scars are visible, you have such beauty on the inside. Those scars will fade in time, not all the way, but everytime you see them in the mirror, just remember that when God brings you to it, He will bring you through it. Good luck, young man, our prayers go out to you. There will be so many kids asking to see them, and admire you for what you have been through.

The history of slavery Joe, is very confusing, but there is no doubt that the traditional enemies in Africa took of advantage of one of the basic laws of capitalism, it's called demand. The demand for manual labor in the """"new"""" world that was being stolen from its rightful owners created this demand and created a huge market for slaves. It is very unlikely that without this demand there would have been much less abductions among Africans for that purpose. The primary criminals, and this is irrefutable, were the Christians with their need for cheap manual labor in America.
